alert.note: Alert for Bibb (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 26 at 4:19AM CDT until March 26 at 4:45AM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 AM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN BIBB COUNTY... At 419 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Ashby, or 10 miles west of Jemison, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Lawley, Talladega National Forest, Ashby, Brierfield Ironworks Park, Randolph, Trio and Six Mile. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
